name: HEXABOMINATION
description:
HEXABOMINATION:

GOAL:

Control the blue player with 6 buttons: W, E, D, X, Z, A to move in a hex pattern.

Try to get as many points as possible, by walking on the hexagonal platforms; 

Beware! Every platform you stand on get's destroyed when you walk of it!

Every 10 seconds all the platforms will change their colors randomly.

PLATFORMS:

Grey: worth 1 point, has no special ability.

Gold: worth 3 points, fixes some platforms that were already destroyed.

Green: worth 5 points, teleports you to a random platform.
